front.title: IANA Allocation Procedures for OTN Signal Type Subregistry to the GMPLS Signaling Parameters Registry

abstract.t: IANA has defined an "OTN Signal Type" subregistry to the"Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) SignalingParameters" registry. This draft proposes changes to the OTN SignalType subregistry to include Specification Required policies, asdefined in [RFC5226].
